io.klerch.alexa.tellask.util.resource

Class YamlReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.klerch.alexa.tellask.util.resource.YamlReader

  • public class YamlReader
extends Object
    This reader processes input coming from the resource streams of UtteranceReader to extract the utterances and reprompts and optionally picks one of them randomly.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      YamlReader(UtteranceReader utteranceReader, String locale)
      A new YAMLReader needs an UtteranceReader so it can obtain YAML content with utterances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<String> getRandomReprompt(AlexaOutput output)
      Returns a reprompt utterance randomly picked from a set of reprompt utterances for an intent which is defined in the AlexaOutput.
      Optional<String> getRandomReprompt(String intentName)
      Returns a reprompt utterance randomly picked from a set of reprompt utterances for a given intent.
      Optional<String> getRandomUtterance(AlexaOutput output)
      Returns an utterance randomly picked from a set of utterances for an intent which is defined in the AlexaOutput.

      Returns an utterance randomly picked from a set of utterances for a given intent.
      List<String> getReprompts(AlexaOutput output)
      Returns a set of reprompt utterances for an intent which is defined in the AlexaOutput.
      List<String> getReprompts(String intentName)
      Returns a set of reprompt utterances for a given intent.
      List<String> getUtterances(AlexaOutput output)
      Returns a set of utterances for an intent which is defined in the AlexaOutput.
      List<String> getUtterances(String intentName)

    • Constructor Detail

      • YamlReader

        public YamlReader(UtteranceReader utteranceReader,
                  String locale)
        A new YAMLReader needs an UtteranceReader so it can obtain YAML content with utterances.
        Parameters:
        utteranceReader - the UtteranceReader reading ot YAML content with utterances
        locale - Localized skills will have multiple YAML files (one for each language). By giving this reader a locale it lets the UtteranceReader read out the appropriate YAML file.

    • Method Detail

      • getUtterances

        public List<String> getUtterances(AlexaOutput output)
        Returns a set of utterances for an intent which is defined in the AlexaOutput.
        Parameters:
        output - The AlexaOutput containing the intent name whose utterances are to be returned.
        Returns:
        set of utterances for an intent which is defined in the AlexaOutput
